signin.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up
signin.already_logged_in: You are already logged in. Redirecting...
signin.you_will_be_redirected_to_signin: You will be automatically redirected to the sign-in page.

prompt.click_to_signin: Click the button below to sign in.

albums.no_images: No images in this album yet. Upload some images to get started.
albums.please_log_in: Please log in to view this album
albums.dropzone_instructions: Drag and drop files here, or click to select. You can continue browsing while uploads proceed in the background.
albums.error_unable_create: Unable to create the album right now. Please try again.
albums.create_album_instructions: Give your album a short title and an optional description. You can add media after creating it.
